DESCRIPTION
This manual page documents briefly the &dhpackage; command.
This manual page was written for the &debian; distribution because the original program does not have a manual page. Instead, it has documentation in html available in /usr/share/doc/python-codespeak-lib/.
&dhpackage; is a program that search for a word (or quoted phrase) into python modules under the current directory.
OPTIONS
These programs follow the usual &gnu; command line syntax, with long options starting with two dashes (`-'). A summary of options is included below.
-h --help
Show summary of options.
-i --ignore-case
ignore case distinctions.
-C --context=CONTEXT
how many lines of context to show for each match.
